section.name: Contributors
section.p: Here's a list of contributors of the SignServer project.

ul.li: Henrik Andréasson, kinneh(at)users.sourceforge.net, Project Manager and Initiator.
Philip Vendil, philip(at)primekey.se, Project Manager, Main developer of the framework.
Lars Silvèn, lars(at)primekey.se, SSL-RMI parts and the possibility to have custom web front end.
Tomas Gustavsson, tomas(at)primekey.se, PDF Signer, PKCS11 sign token, Improved the TSA client with more arguments, MRTD SOD signer, lots of improvements
Markus Kilås, markus(at)primekey.se, Core developer, XML Signer/validator, MRTD SOD signer, lots of improvements.
Ezizmuhamet Muhammetkuliyev, rayback2(at)gmail.com, OOXML, ODF Signer/validator, improvements to PDF signer, CRL/OCSP validators.
Christophe Sahut, christophe.sahut(at)sgs.com, Install howto for SignServer 3.1 on RHEL systems.
